title: MD
biography: K. R. Sundaram is an Indian politician and former Member of the Legislative Assembly of Tamil Nadu. He was elected to the Tamil Nadu legislative assembly from Gudiyatham constituency as a Communist Party of India (Marxist) candidate in the 1980 and 1989 elections.
aiSummary: K. R. Sundaram is a clinical trial modeling specialist with an H-index of 110 at Biostatistics (Faculty). Has been published in Life Sciences, Nature. Based in India.
